jd: From: sai kiran, Msysinc resume@msysinc.com Reply to: resume@msysinc.com Title: Project Manager - HybridLocation: Baton Rouge, LA, USALength: Long termRestriction: W2 or C2CSend resume to: saikiran@msysinc.com Description:Interview Type: Skype *** Very long term project initial PO for 3 years, expect to go for 6+ years *** *** Hybrid *** need 3 referencesThe scope of the proposed services will include the following:Provide day to day project management supportActivity and resource planningCreation of project documentation: daily, weekly, semi monthly and monthly status reports project schedules and plans, meeting minutes, risks and issues, other documentation as neededAnalyzing project risks and issues, help identify ways to mitigate risksProcess monitoringMonitor project deliverablesProvide day to day support for on going processesProvide on going evaluation and improvements for processes work in needed areas to provide support services for agencys workload demands.Documentation of specifications and requirements trackingConduct cost/benefit analysis6 years experienceAgilePMP/government experience prferred
